column2: Algal blooms- lake starting to get green.
Lake is low due to lack of rain.
Algal blooms- lake level about 1' low.  Water level: very low.
Ice off 4/5/97.  Lake is pretty clean.
Lake starting to green up.  A lot of dead fish on shore.
air temp.68 degrees clear and breezy
air temp.76 degrees.partly cloudy and breezy.Alrea
air temp. 76 degrees. partly cloudy winds 5-10 mph
air temp 79 degrees partly cloudy + breezy obseved

column1: young blue herons + 4 sets of ducks with young

column2: air temp. 79 degrees bald eagle seen flying and
air temp. 78 degrees pea green film on surface water

column1: down 1 to 2 feet either because of no rain and/or they are fixing the dam

column2: sunny- slight breeze- 74F- some debris is water
68F- slight wind- cloudy- debris in water
80F- slight breeze- mostly sunny- water very clear for this time of year
65F- no wind- large pieces of algae floating
70F- breezy- cloudy- light mist on and off all day
some clouds- 77 degrees- lots of dead fish floating in water
partly cloudy- breezy- 78 degrees- starting to get a pea green film on parts of lake
sunny- 91 degrees- slight breeze- no rain for about 16 days
sunny- 90 degrees. slight breeze- no rain
sunny 78 degrres- slight breeze- 3 1/2 inches of rain this week
cloudy no breeze- 75 degrees- no rain this week
sunny- breezy- 81 degrees- 2/10 inches of rain this week- leaves starting to change color
90F- Crappy's and blue gills in shallows- water temp 76F- breezy- May orioles and hummingbirds back
74F- breezy; dead crappies floating; sunny- worm algae floating

86F- muggy- partly cloudy- 2 adult and six young canadian geese- at least 3 different sets of young geese- no blue herons seen on the lake- but seem to be in shallows by bridge and up river- no rain for 3 weeks
Secchi dish no reading water high very windy water temp 63 degrees partly cloudy Secchi dish no reading water high very windy water temp 63 degrees partly cloudy-.80 inches of rain
Month of june rainy could not get good readings. 75 degrees -no wind -sunny
75 degrees- sunny - some wind green scum on water
mostly sunny- some wind- water has a green scum on top mostly sunny- some wind- water has a green scum on top- 74 degrees out
water fairly clear- fish starting to bite again- seen three pigeon hawks.
Sunny- some wind-frog pond scum in lake because of rain- about 5" rain within the last 2 weeks
water turning green- lots of frog pond weeds in the water because of rain water turning green- lots of frog pond weeds in the water because of rain-  temp. 75 degrees- partly sunny- some wind
ice gone on lake hummingbirds- oriels- mergansers- and geesenare back. Seen an osprey flying over lake- rose-breasted grosbeaks back on 5/16
74 degrees- sunny -some wind- frog pond algea floating on top- seen young bald eagle- seen commerants on lake

3 sets of Canadian Geese with at least 5 young each- humming birds back4/11/11- oriels back 4/4/11. Not as many comerants or mergansers seen on the lake this spring.Fish spawning late this year.Lake temp. 6/1/11 57 degrees
sunny- warm - slight breeze - very nice out
seen 2 commarents on lake all geese are gone water has more of a grrn film on top
mostly cloudy- 036" rain- some breeze- high 79 degrees
Canadian geese on lake- a little rain and breezy
Loon on lake- pelican seen flying over lake- 62 degrees- cloudy some wind
cloudy -windy with rain- cormorants seen on lake
water temp 71 degrees- cloudy -warm - no wind- 70 degrees
81 degrees- hot and humid- some sprinkles in the afternoon- wind picking up
lake froze over- couple of inches of snow on ground
46 degrees- very foggy- people starting to ice fish this week
11 degrees- cold- windy- about 14 to 18 inches of ice on lake
about 50 degrees- seen robin and Canadian geese people still ice fishing
28 degrees- sunny- no wind- about 3 to 6 inches of ice
nice out -sunny with some wind - heard a loon
cloudy and windy about 3 1/4" of rain
found dead adult Canada goose- some dead crappies
Orieles and hummingbirds back at beginning of month. Canadian geese and mergansers back also. Saw a Trumpiter swan also.

Water very nice- Hummingbirds- Orioles- and Canadian geese back. Seen a Trumpeter swan- A pair of pie billed ducks- not as many comorants or mergansers ducks this year. Ice off 4-15-2018 but weather fairly cold. Nice day out on 5-26-2018 high around 90 Degrees slight breeze
Nice day out breezy with lots of sun. Water a little higher than normal. About 7" of rain this week a lot of debris in water.
Lots of rain. Water high and muddy. cannot do Secchi reading.
Canadian geese- mergansers and comerants back. Hummingbirds and orieles back. Lots of rain water level high and very muddy.
Spotted a flock of pelicans swimming on the lake.
Very nice out no rain slight breeze
Ice gone from the lake. Water level normal.
